report.title: Occurrence images list for a CMS user
report.description: A general purpose list of images filtered according to the ID of the user when logged into the content management system.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM occurrences o JOIN occurrence_images oi ON oi.occurrence_id=o.id AND oi.deleted=false JOIN samples s ON s.id=o.sample_id AND s.deleted = FALSE JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id LEFT JOIN locations l ON l.id=s.location_id JOIN (sample_attribute_values sav JOIN sample_attributes sa ON sa.id=sav.sample_attribute_id AND sa.deleted=false AND sa.caption='CMS User ID' ) ON sav.sample_id=s.id AND sav.deleted=false #joins# WHERE o.deleted = FALSE AND #website_filter# AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (CAST(cttl.taxon_group_id AS character varying)='#taxon_group_id#' OR '#taxon_group_id#'='') AND CAST(sav.int_value AS character varying)='#user_id#' #order_by#
report.field_sql: o.id as occurrence_id, oi.path, oi.caption, s.id as sample_id, COALESCE(l.name, s.location_name) as location_name, s.entered_sref, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type, cttl.id as taxa_taxon_list_id, cttl.preferred_taxon as taxon, cttl.default_common_name as common, coalesce(cttl.default_common_name, cttl.preferred_taxon) as species, cttl.taxon_group as taxon_group, o.zero_abundance

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: taxon_group_id
param.description: Select the taxon group to return data for, or leave for all groups
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM taxon_groups

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the ID of the CMS user

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include as columns in the report
